header.title: Ole Oskar Heinrichs
header.subtitle: O$ka
header.description: Focused on the intersection of music and AI. Currently working in Marketing & Distribution at EuroArts and as Marketing Manager at KI-Academy. Passionate about music creation and AI advancements.

musicReleases.title: Music Releases
musicReleases.description: Original music releases that showcase songwriting, production, mixing, mastering, and recording techniques. I have produced most of my tracks completely on my own. A significant part of my music history can be found on SoundCloud.

youtubeCommentary.title: Music Analysis
youtubeCommentary.description: Together with producer CAS (Sound Engineering BA) and friends, we analyze various music pieces and provide in-depth insights into music production, composition techniques, and our musical influences.

euroarts.title: Marketing & Distribution
euroarts.description: Responsible for marketing and distribution of classical music recordings.

kiacademy.title: Marketing Manager
kiacademy.description: Leading marketing initiatives for AI education programs.

education.title: Music Production & Songwriting, BA
education.description: Focus on music production, recording, and composition.

blog.title: Blog & Thoughts
blog.description: Content about music and AI will be available here soon.
